About

Maties Machine Learning

Machine learning has a rich history at Stellenbosch University, with research spanning several faculties and departments. This created a need for a forum to bring together researchers and students from across the university. This led to the creation of Maties Machine Learning (MML): a seminar series with short talks on peopleâ€™s current work, some ML-related topic, or open discussions. Anyone interested in ML is very welcome to join our group.

We meet roughly every second week. We communicate through our mailing list and this website. Our talks are normally in K303 in the Engineering Knowledge Centre, but keep an eye on the upcoming talks and emails to see the venue locations for each week.
